days.title: Day 1 Prayer
days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

Dear St Juan Diego, pray for me as I recall the comforting words that Our Lady of Guadalupe spoke to you,
Hear me and understand well, my littlest son, that nothing should frighten or grieve you. Let not your heart be disturbed. Do not fear that sickness, nor any other sickness or anguish. Am I not here, who is your Mother? Are you not under my protection? Am I not your health? Are you not happily within my mantle? What else do you wish? Do not grieve nor be disturbed by anything.
O St. Juan Diego, Our Lady of Guadalupe chose you as her faithful messenger.
You demonstrated your complete faith in her, and to this day it is visible in the miraculous image the Virgin left upon your tilma.
Intercede for me, I pray, that I might have your childlike trust in the Mother of God, and that my heart might respond to her maternal promptings, especially I ask for (mention your request here…)
Through such simple confidence, obedience, and love, may I join you one day in sharing everlasting joy, where our heavenly Mother reigns in the glory of Her Son.
Amen.

Concluding Prayer

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be
St Juan Diego, pray for us!
